doc.title: La signature
doc.plot: Hans, made rich and popular by his horror best-seller stories, is the creator of one of the most terrifying and popular killing monster; La Chose. The beast is slaughtering from one book to another and bringing wealth and worship by thousands of fans for the aging and tired writer. But tonight, Hans has had enough, he is going to destroy his own creation that killed his creative impulse and love for writing.
